message:
Good morning!
On the one hand, I have to get up early.
On the other hand, I'm very excited because I can play The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom tomorrow.
Let's make a guess.Will The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom surpass The Legend of Zelda: Breath of The Wild to become the top scorer in the game zone?（bangumi only ）
Welcome to discuss together!
title: Good morning!
userSign: (だから集まって星座になりたい)
